Class ColorWheelPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • mc21g14.colorpicker.ColorWheelPaint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Transparency

    public class ColorWheelPaint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.Paint
    Paints a ColourWheel, designed to be used *only* with ColorPickerPanel.
    Author:
    Matthew Consterdine
